scene.name: intro
scene.line: Wow, I haven't seen that poster in a while! I think that was mine from college ... yeah, definitely.
Oh, right, Darryl swapped it out in the redesign. Now it's ...
Yeah, it's ... that's weird, I can't picture it. I mean I can picture the wall, and there's definitely `something` hung there.
Want me to go look? It's just down the hall. Ha ha.
